Q1：special pattern depends on x


```{r pattern}
x= int(input("enter the x:"))

pattern=function(x){
  pass
}


if (x==0){
  print()
}elif (x <0 ){
  print("pls enter knon-negative interger")
}else{
  pattern(x)
}
```

Q2:Fibonacci sequence
題目未規定明確型態，因此以設計到第十個數

```{r series, echo=FALSE}
fibonacci = function(a,b){
  c = a+b
  return(c)
}

a= 0
b =1
x = c(0,1)
for (i in 1:10){
  c = fibonacci(a,b)
  x = c(x,c)
  a=b
  b=c
}
print(x)
```
